remarks: An inference for distributing quantifiers over a double implication. The general statement that ~ spimfw proves.  (Contributed by BJ, 12-May-2019.)  (New usage is discouraged.) (Proof modification is discouraged.)
statement:
bj-nalnalimiOLD.1 $e |- ( ch -> ( ph -> ps ) ) $.
bj-nalnalimiOLD.2 $e |- ( -. ps -> A. x -. ps ) $.
bj-nalnalimiOLD $p |- ( -. A. x -. ch -> ( A. x ph -> ps ) ) $.
